description:
Test driven development is a method of programming that has been talked
about considerably over the past few years. It is a way of programming
that aims to achieve good quality code, by specifying your problems
through writing tests first.

In my tutorial i will introduce the core concepts of TDD through
creating a simple web application using Python & Django. I will explain
in detail the TDD workflow. Attendees to this tutorial will be
introduced to functional testing with Selenium and to unit testing with
the Python Standard Library\`s unittest Module.

My tutorial is aimed at beginners to Test Driven Development. I expect
attendees to have some familiarity with python and Django.
title: Introduction to Test Driven Development with Python
